name: Zombie Mitosis
description:
Your boat crashes on a deserted island with a special kind of zombie on it. The zombie goes through mitosis when dead creating 2 more zombies. Try to survive for long enough for your boat to turn on. Good luck!

Note: This is our first game. There will be bugs.

Created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Programming - Dominic

Art - Parker
